subject: Madison Square Garden
Stadiums and Arenas
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Devils, Mets, Yankees, Giants,Jets and Nets are all in new homes, or soon will be. The Knicks and Rangers are going to have to settle for improvements at the old Garden, for the time being.
snippet: The Devils, Mets, Yankees, Giants,Jets and Nets are all in new homes, or soon will be. The Knicks and Rangers are going to have to settle for improvements at the old Garden, for the time being.
